name: Rejected Hero
Description: One evening four people were in a classroom they were simply there after school and some of them were friends the room then suddenly brightened and a circle with wired symbol taking them to a room filled with people where they stated that only three heroes were supposed to be summoned from the other world and now that there was one extra though looking through their status they found that he had the lowest stats by far and his skills were all locked so they threw him back into a magic circle somewhere in the void he was spat out into a great forest alone and having to face the world of dangers all by himself.
